name: Badly-made Tanks
description:
Made for RNDJAM2. This was a lot of fun. Not everything we wanted to include made it in but the game is still fun and challenging. Hope you enjoy playing Badly-made Tanks.

WASD to move. Mouse to aim and shoot.
Collect scrap to repair, and upgrades to dominate.
The final boss and its three generals await you.

Enemy tanks spill their parts as scrap for you to pick up when they are defeated.
Some more powerful tanks have useful upgrades they drop when beaten, collect these to make the final fight easier.
